titleInfo.title: STOLEN from the plantation of Boykin & Lang

mods.abstract: STOLEN from the plantation of Boykin & Lang on Bayou Black, parish of Terrebonne, on Friday the 6th inst., the mulato boy GRASIER, about ten years of age; any one apprehending the theif and dy leaving the boy where I can get him will be liberally rewardjan-14-tf D.NLANG.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
